member.name: T:EIDSSControlLibrary.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:EIDSSControlLibrary.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:EIDSSControlLibrary.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:EIDSSControlLibrary.CalendarInput.Format
member.summary: This property is used to define the calendar format (e.g. MM/DD/YYYY)

member.name: P:EIDSSControlLibrary.CalendarInput.ContainerCssClass
member.summary: This is the class given to the outer container of the elements rendered by this class. if no class is specified, the container will receive a default class of .datepicker

member.name: P:EIDSSControlLibrary.CalendarInput.defaultCssClass
member.summary: This is the default css class used in the container if the Property ContainerCssClass is Empty or Null

member.name: M:EIDSSControlLibrary.CalendarInput.Render(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter)
member.summary: This is the method that renders all the elements to the page. This method renders a div, two spans and a textbox with appropriate CSS to paint a jQuery calendar on the UI

member.name: M:EIDSSControlLibrary.CalendarInput.GetContainerCssClass
member.summary: this function determines if the ContainerCsssClass is empty and assigns the default value of .datepicker

member.name: P:EIDSSControlLibrary.GridView.IsModal
member.summary: This Property flags this grid as a modal pop up

member.summary: Read only property, gets wxpected value in query string key name: listId

member.name: P:EIDSSControlLibrary.GridView.key
member.summary: key holds name of column used to return value to parent page

member.name: P:EIDSSControlLibrary.GridView.KeyNameUsedOnModal
member.summary: Name of column that holds the id used to return value to parent page

member.name: P:EIDSSControlLibrary.GridView.CurrentColumnOrder
member.summary: This gets or sets a coma separated list of the column headings in shown in order of appearance

member.name: M:EIDSSControlLibrary.GridView.OnPreRender(System.EventArgs)

member.summary: Renders Grid to Page
